  • url (str) – The URL of the profile image.

The updated user.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – The user object.

  • refresh_token (str) – The new refresh token.

verify_password(user_email, input_password)¶

Verify user password.

Parameters:

  • user_email (str) – The email of the user.

  • input_password (str) – The password to verify.

Returns:

True if password is correct, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

Send an email.

  • message (str) – The message content of the email.

contacts_api dependencies rate limiter¶

class dependencies.rate_limiter.RateLimiter(max_requests, window_time)¶

Bases: object

Rate limiter class to limit the number of requests from clients.

is_allowed(client_id)¶

Check if the client is allowed to make a request based on rate limiting rules.

Parameters:

client_id (str) – Unique identifier for the client (e.g., client IP address).

Returns:

True if the request is allowed, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

async dependencies.rate_limiter.rate_limit(request: Request)¶

Rate limit middleware to restrict the number of requests from clients.

Parameters:

request (Request) – The incoming HTTP request.

Raises:

HTTPException – If the number of requests exceeds the limit, raises a 429 Too Many Requests error.

Returns:

True if the request is allowed, otherwise raises an exception.

Return type:

bool
